features: ENTERTAINMENT-INSPIRED DESIGN: Imagine exciting action with this premium Grail Knight action figure, inspired by Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
MOVIE-INSPIRED ACCESSORIES: This collectible Grail Knight action figure includes detachable sword and Holy Grail accessories
BUILD AN ARTIFACT: Collect select Adventure Series figures to acquire all the pieces needed to build the Grail Table
PREMIUM ARTICULATION AND DETAILING: Fans can display this collectible, fully articulated figure featuring poseable head, arms, and legs, as well as premium deco, in their Indiana Jones collection
ICONIC CHARACTERS: Adventure Series 6 inch Indiana Jones action figures feature iconic characters from the adventures of Indiana Jones
COLLECTIBLE TOYS: Discover other Adventure Series 6-inch Indiana Jones toy figures that make great gifts for kids and collectors alike (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
body.description: Indiana Jones races against the forces of evil to find the holy grail and keep it from falling into the wrong hands! Kids and collectors alike can imagine the action and adventure of Indiana Jones with figures from the Indiana Jones Adventure Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series unearths the quality and realism that Indiana Jones devotees love. The Adventure Series includes figures and roleplay items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the adventures of Indiana Jones. (Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.) This collectible 6-inch-scale Adventure Series figure is detailed to look like the Grail Knight character from Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation. Indiana Jones products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Indiana Jones Adventure Series | Grail Knight (Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade) Indiana Jones races against the forces of evil to find the holy grail and keep it from falling into the wrong hands! Kids and collectors alike can imagine the action and adventure of Indiana Jones with figures from the Indiana Jones Adventure Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series unearths the quality and realism that Indiana Jones devotees love. The Adventure Series includes figures and roleplay items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the adventures of Indiana Jones. This collectible 6-inch-scale Adventure Series figure is detailed to look like the Grail Knight character from Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation.

Product Features: Indiana Jones Adventure Series The Indiana Jones Adventure Series is inspired by the 40-plus-year legacy of the adventures of Indiana Jones. Adventure Series 6-inch action figures and adult roleplay items feature premium design and detail. Premium Articulation and Design in 6-Inch Scale Featuring realistic detailing, Indiana Jones Adventure Series figures let fans re-create the exciting adventures of archaeologist Indiana Jones. Iconic characters are presented in 6-inch scale with premium design and deco, packaging, accessories, and multiple points of articulation that elevate the heroes and villains of Indiana Jones to the next level. Build a Collection that Belongs in a Museum Featuring a cast of endearing companions and notorious villains, the Adventure Series lets fans bring home the action and excitement of the adventures of Indiana Jones, including highly articulated 6-inch figures and premium adult roleplay items. Hunt them down to build a collection worthy of a museum!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very accurate, fantastic accessories, good range of motion, the Grail Knight would be proud
reviews.reviewText: I'm surprised how much this Grail Knight figure jumps off the screen into action figure form. Adventure Series has been a pretty good line but this knight is top tier. His detailed sculpt looks just like the actor and covers a good range of his expressiveness.The accessories are surprisingly nice, the sword looks good with its subtly-painted hilt, the scabbard looks good and works very well, the true grail looks just like the film with that subtle gold interior, the other pieces look nice too; the only thing missing is an alternate right hand for that wave he does in his final scene.The paint seemed simple at first, but there's a lot going on, and the knight kept clean so he didn't have any weathering, although a subtle wash might have been nice for realism. Silvery plastic handles the chainmail, and looks better than most armored figures using this technique. The face is painted surprisingly tightly for a mainstream figure with a beard and expressive eyes. There's a lot of paint on the accessories, and even silver painted details on one of the belts, though not both. There's even a gilded painted edge to his crossed sword chest emblems, that's a lot for any company selling mass market figures.Articulation is less restrictive than I expected, the slits in the skirt mean he can move outside it to some degree, the butterfly shoulders move pretty well, the ball-jointed wrists move better than on Indy figures in this line, the elbows only go to just above 90 degrees but it's enough for me, the ball-jointed waist works well, the knees go to around 90, the ankles have good rocker joints and a deep hinge but no boot rotation. The neck is ball jointed and a little limited by the design, but moves more than I expected. His left hand holds the sword quite tightly, the right hand holds it a little loosely I suspect because the designers wanted it to double as the waving look.The cape is large and static, but it fits well, has a nice sculpt, stays in place from a peg into the back, and has nice paint on the tie and the shoulder emblem.All in all, I'm surprisingly happy with this figure, I think they did a tremendous job with the Grail Knight even above the other Adventure Series figures.

You need the others Indiana Jones figures to build the Artifact set.Any Indiana Jones fan must have this never made action figure in series 2.A Indiana Jones fan, Joe NY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You have chosen... pretty decently, actually.
reviews.reviewText: The level of detail on display is the main selling point of this figure, as well as being a high point of the Adventure Series overall. In particular, the facial likeness and the chain mail armor are outstanding, with surprisingly little "marbling" that so frequently comes with using metallic plastics. Perhaps the tunic could use some weathering, but overall this is an excellent representation of the Grail Knight.What kept this figure from getting five stars is that the articulation is hindered by the stiff PVC skirt, but my main critique is that the stiff PVC cape is so long that it can actually prevent the Knight from standing. I'm a big proponent of PVC capes instead of "soft goods" that don't wear right and aren't durable, but Hasbro generally doesn't use the right kind of PVC for the right job. McFarlane Toys has nailed this issue with their recent Batman figures, where the cape is made of a very flexible, yet durable, PVC.
